TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ResXDataNode extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ResXDataNode Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件中的元素。

span.span: Represents an element in an XML resource (.resx) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持的资源文件中的丰富的数据类型的表示形式。The class supports the representation of rich data types within a resource file. 只要该对象支持序列化和类型的编辑器，它可以在资源文件中，支持的任何对象的存储。It can support the storage of any object in a resource file, so long as the object supports serialization and type editors. 您可以创建对象通过调用其重载的类构造函数之一。You can create a object by calling one of its overloaded class constructors. 然后可以添加元素的资源项到资源文件通过调用方法。You can then add the resource item or element to a resource file by calling the method. 若要检索的现有对象，必须先枚举通过实例化的 XML 资源文件中的对象对象，设置属性设置为`true`，并调用方法获取一个枚举器。To retrieve an existing object, you must enumerate the objects in an XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to get an enumerator. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取对象，用于枚举.resx 文件中的对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the objects in a .resx file. 该示例包含`CreateResourceFile`创建必需的 XML 资源文件的例程。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary XML resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXDataNode.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxdatanode.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#1)] 因为属性是`true`，则属性是对象而不是资源值。Because the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 这使得资源项的注释可从属性。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置关于此资源的任意注释。

span.span: Gets or sets an arbitrary comment regarding this resource.
A string that represents the comment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果注释尚未分配到的资源项，值属性是。If a comment has not been assigned to the resource item, the value of the property is . 你访问通过实例化现有的 XML 资源文件中的数据节点的属性对象，设置属性设置为`true`，并调用方法来检索用于枚举 XML 资源文件中的项的对象。You access the property of an data node in an existing XML resource file by instantiating a object, setting the property to `true`, and calling the method to retrieve an object that you use to enumerate the items in the XML resource file. 属性返回对象。The property returns the object. ## Examples 有关示例，请参阅类。See the example for the class.

summary.span: 检索资源在资源文件中的位置。

span.span: Retrieves the position of the resource in the resource file.

returns.span: 以行位置 () 和列位置 形式指定此资源在资源文件中的位置的结构。

span.span: A structure that specifies the location of this resource in the resource file as a line position () and a column position ().

returns.span: 如果此资源不属于资源文件，则此方法返回一个 和 均为 0 的结构。

span.span: If this resource is not part of a resource file, this method returns a structure that has an of 0 and a of 0.

summary.span: 检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService typeResolver) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (typeResolver As ITypeResolutionService) As Object

param.name: typeResolver
param.span: 查找类型转换器时要使用的类型解析服务。

span.span: The type resolution service to use when looking for a type converter.

summary.span: 通过使用指定的类型解决方案服务检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by using the specified type resolution service.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在内存中当前存在于存储的值，它是直接返回。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 如果在资源文件中存储并且不是文件引用，寻找使用可以从字符串转换为相应的对象的指定的类型解析服务。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks for a by using the specified type resolution service that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果资源是文件引用，尝试反序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to de-serialize it.

exception.span: 未能找到对应的类型，或者相应的类型转换器不可用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName[] names) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (names As AssemblyName()) As Object

param.name: names
param.span: 要在其中搜索对象类型的程序集列表。

span.span: The list of assemblies to search for the type of the object.

summary.span: 通过搜索指定程序集检索由此节点存储的对象。

span.span: Retrieves the object that is stored by this node by searching the specified assemblies.
The object that corresponds to the stored value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在内存中当前存在于存储的值，它是直接返回。If the stored value currently exists in memory, it is returned directly. 如果在资源文件中存储并且不是文件引用，会查找由名称标识要查找的对象的相应类型的程序集，然后查找，可以从字符串转换为相应的对象。If it is stored in the resource file and it is not a file reference, looks in the assemblies identified by names to find the object's corresponding type, and then looks for a that can convert from a string to the appropriate object. 如果资源是文件引用，尝试反序列化。If the resource is a file reference, tries to deserialize it.

exception.span: 未能找到对应的类型，或者相应的类型转换器不可用。

span.span: The corresponding type could not be found, or an appropriate type converter is not available.
Retrieves the type name for the value.

The destination for this serialization.

summary.span: 使用序列化目标对象所需的数据填充 对象。

span.span: Populates a object with the data needed to serialize the target object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
